content: In Greek mythology, what hero had to complete 12 seemingly impossible tasks as penance for his actions?

That would be Heracles, also known as Hercules in Roman mythology. He was tasked with completing these challenges, known as the Twelve Labors, to atone for his past mistakes and to prove his worth as a hero. The tasks were set by his cousin, King Eurystheus, and they included fighting monsters, cleaning stables, and capturing wild animals, among others. Heracles successfully completed all twelve labors, which are some of the most famous stories in Greek mythology.
